text: Penny or internationally Penny Market (in Austria Penny Markt) is a discount supermarket chain based in Germany, which operates 3,550 stores. The market was founded by Leibbrand Gruppe in 1973; since 1989 it has been owned by the REWE Group. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Supermarkets of Germany Category:Organizations based in Cologne
title: Penny (supermarket)
